category: news
title: "Does cognitive function after retirement differ across race and sex?"
excerpt: "A study published in the Journal of the American Geriatrics Society found that immediately after retirement, white adults tended to experience a significant decline in cognitive function, whereas Black adults experienced minimal cognitive decline."
